name: @aichatwatch/aicw
description: AI Chat Watch - Know what AI says about your brand, competitors and industry

scripts.dev:prebuild: rm -rf dist/ && node scripts/build-link-types.js && node scripts/validate-pipelines.js
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && tsc && npm run postbuild
scripts.test:local: npm run build && node bin/aicw.js help
scripts.link:local: npm run build && npm link && echo 'aicw command is now available globally'
scripts.link:dev: npm run build && npm link && npm link aicw && echo 'Development mode enabled with auto-rebuild'
scripts.unlink:local: npm unlink -g aicw && echo 'aicw command removed'
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.pack:test: npm run build && npm pack && echo 'Package created'
scripts.pack:clean: rimraf aicw-*.tgz && echo 'Cleaned up test packages'

author: Evgenii Mironichev
